dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1173 IH: Equal Federal Funding for the District of Columbia Act

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 1, United States Code, to provide that, for the purpose of determining eligibility for Federal funds, the District of Columbia shall be treated as a State and any political subdivision of a State or unit of local government, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Equal Federal Funding for the District of Columbia Act.

section.header: Treatment of the District of Columbia as State and any political subdivision of State or unit of local government for purposes of Federal funding

subsection.text: Chapter 1 of title 1, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

section.header: District of Columbia treated as State and political subdivision of State or unit of local government
section.text: In determining eligibility for Federal funds or relating to the use of Federal funds, the District of Columbia shall be treated as a State and as any political subdivision of a State or unit of local government, unless otherwise provided.

subsection.text: The table of sections for such chapter is amended by adding at the end the following:

toc.toc-entry: 9. District of Columbia treated as State and political subdivision of State or unit of local government.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this Act shall take effect on October 1, 2026.
